description: Twin Towers Demo - Historic NYC towers placed on San Francisco map for deck.gl demonstration

properties.name: North Tower (1 WTC)
properties.description: North Tower of the original World Trade Center - 417m tall, 110 stories
properties.demo_note: Placed in SF for deck.gl visualization demo

properties.name: South Tower (2 WTC)
properties.description: South Tower of the original World Trade Center - 415m tall, 110 stories
properties.demo_note: Placed in SF for deck.gl visualization demo

properties.name: Salesforce Tower (for scale reference)
properties.description: Current tallest building in San Francisco - for height comparison
properties.demo_note: Included to show Twin Towers were significantly taller

properties.name: Transamerica Pyramid (for scale reference)
properties.description: Iconic SF building - same era as Twin Towers
properties.demo_note: Shows how Twin Towers dominated skylines of their era
